answers.answer: Hey!I would get tested for diabetes and thyroid disease, if that comes up clean, you can buy liquid vitamins. I have to do it that way because I don't absorb anything other then Calcium.Even better, see your doctor! And tell him/her your symptoms and ask for a blood requisition. If he/she won't do it, I'd suggest finding a new doctor. You wouldn't ask if you weren't worried about your own health, right?

question: I've had an ongoing problem with being Anaemic since last year. I also have tingling sensations in my toes (although I'm not sure whether this is connected or not). I was just wondering what it is they would test for?
